intro: Urceolaria clusiifolia, commonly known as the "Cushion Urceolaria," is a flowering plant native to South America, particularly found in Brazil. Urceolaria clusiifolia is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is well-suited to moist, well-drained soils in shaded environments.
